replies.bodyText: Maybe then, java-basic should be replaced with java-quickstart and rulesets/java/design.xml with a dummy config/my-ruleset.xml? Quickstart is the only non-deprecated ruleset we have as of now. Or maybe one of those two should be removed. The form language-ruleset has become not so useful since we moved rules into categories, and reduced the number of rulesets, so maybe this has to go. @adangel wdyt?

yes, we should just remove the example "java-basic". I don't think we have documented this notation anywhere.
